Job Title: Facilities Technician

Location: Fort Mill, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description

At Shutterfly, we make life’s experiences unforgettable. We believe there is extraordinary power in the self-expression. That’s why our family of brands helps customers create products and capture moments that reflect who they uniquely are.

What You'll Do Here

Coordinates with Facilities Manager to maintain and utilize internal work order tracking software, and provide hands on issue resolution and work order follow upCoordinate with EHS on ergonomic evaluations, and delivery of supporting furniture adjustments and/or system furniture installationAssists in set up and tear down of conference rooms and other spaces for scheduled meetings and eventsBe familiar with, and able to perform minor construction techniques and processesDemonstrated organizational skillsAttention to detail in a fast-paced high-tech environmentProviding direction to outside service vendors who are hired to perform work at the campusProficient written and communication skills, able to communicate with service requestors and vendorsQualified candidates should be a motivated self-starter, able to act on minimal verbal or written information, multitask and deliver requested services without constant management assistanceParticipate on Safety CommitteeProvide support to the Facilities Manager on various facilities projects (minor to major interior remodels)Travel to other sites to survey and/or respond to work ticketsRespond to assigned requests within the work order system in a timely and effective mannerInteract with employees and upper management in a respectful and professional mannerComplete basic troubleshooting, repairs & preventative maintenance to assist with the upkeep of the buildings and grounds (including plumbing, minor electrical, basic HVAC, etc.)This role is required to be on-call. 1 week a month in rotation to cover after hours & weekend emergencies as neededValid driver’s license is required

What You'll Bring:

5 years’ experience in a similar facilities role or equivalent trade experience (i.e. furniture installation, minor electrical, plumbing, or general construction)Microsoft OfficeA High School diplomaUnderstanding of the proper and safe use of small hand tools

Other Requirements

The ability to work safely in a facilities role – following ladder safety, LOTO procedures, etc.Must wear appropriate PPEThe ability to lift 50lbsAbility to work in an office environment with variable noise conditionsAbility to crouch, bend, twist, reach, climb ladders and be comfortable on roofs, stand and walk for long periods of time and work in variable temperatures

Supporting a diverse and inclusive workforce is important to Shutterfly not only because it directly reflects our value of Embracing our Differences, but also because it’s the right thing to do for our business and for our people. Learn more about our commitment to Diversity, Equity and Inclusion at Shutterfly DE&I.

This position will accept applications on an ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
